name: Rhizome (La Saison du Croissant)
description:
Rhizome is a metroidvania where you play a plant growing in the forest. Find new abilities to grow even further. 

The game is played only with the mouse. Click on a tile to grow. Drag and drop anywhere on the screen to scroll the camera.

The game was made for the metroidvania month 16 in one month.
The music was made by Nillan : https://nillan.itch.io/
